channel.title: Help with bluurs client changing ip
channel.description: Help i made a bluurrs webclient and it connects to 127.0.0.1 not the server ip but when i run the client.jar on my computer it connects to the server ip not 127.0.0.1. how would i make it so that when the webclient is on the website it connects to the serverip

item.title: Help with bluurs client changing ip
item.dc:creator: @slimjimm000 slimjimm000
item.description:

Help i made a bluurrs webclient and it connects to 127.0.0.1 not the server ip but when i run the client.jar on my computer it connects to the server ip not 127.0.0.1. how would i make it so that when the webclient is on the website it connects to the serverip
